definition.en: Indicates the actor removed specific goal or task
Indicates the actor filtered content that aligns to specific goal
Indicates the actor has set a learning goal
Indicates the actor received list of goal recommendations over time, based on selected goal with recursive depth, what set of content can achieve mastery in the ordered sub-goals
Indicates the learner received the recommendation to follow a career path, work towards a learning objective, or perform a learning activity from the actor
Indicates that the actor assigned themselves a new learning goal, without needing approval
Indicates an OICS approved a requested activity for the given learner
Indicates the actor searched active learning goals related to specific content, viewing what other content may trigger related goals, based on active goal and recently completed content
Indicates the actor queried what other content may also reinforce the current learning goal, after completing content
Indicates the actor assigned a learning goal to a learner
Indicates the actor scheduled an activity or lesson
Indicates the learner(s) appeared in a Measure of Effectiveness (MOE) search (Learner competency state vs readiness)
Indicates the learner(s) appeared in a competency search based on their competency state
Indicates the learner(s) appeared in a Measure of Performance (MOP) search (learner grade in assessment)
Indicates the actor completed assessments in a way that will cause a change in their authoritative learner state
Indicates the user performed a number of connected learning activities that should result in a change in their authoritative learner state
Indicates the actor's competency state needs to be updated based on completed content
Indicates the learner interacted with "Wild" (out of network) content in a social environment
Indicates the learner interacted with "Wild" (out of network) content
Indicates the learner has provided sufficient evidence to update the learner's measure of competence in a given competency
Indicates an OICS approved a change to a competency framework within the TLA that will affect the learners’ states
Indicates an authoritative source changed a learner's competency assertions based on a valid competency framework change
Indicates the learner meets all the requirements for a badge, but hasn't been awarded the badge yet
Indicates the OICS conferred a badge to the learner in the learner context extension
Indicates the learner received an accreditation by an authoritative source to perform a given job or task
Indicates the authoritative source verified evidence of learning from a non-authoritative source as reliable data
Indicates the actor recruited the learner to join the ecosystem
Indicates the learner met entry criteria for jobs and assigned a career trajectory
OICS detailed the learner to a specific job
OICS mobilized the learner to a state of on duty
Indicates OICS employs the actor such that they started work doing their job
Indicates OICS has enrolled the learner in a schooling system
Indicates OICS has changed a learner’s rank, either up or down
Indicates OICS screened learner for a potentially narrower career trajectory, and passed through a "gate" within their career trajectory
Indicates OICS selected learner based on criteria for a potentially wider career trajectory, opening up new career possibilities
Indicates the actor changed career paths, putting them on a completely different and brand new career trajectory
Indicates OICS released the learner from the learning environment
Indicates OICS temporarily restricted the learner from some (possibly all) participation within the learning environment
A knowledge, skill, ability, or other object needed to perform in a given task
Any generic activity an actor can interact with, that is not an assessment
Any generic exercise that assesses the user's level of competence.
Any generic collection of activities and/or assessment activities
An online badge that is earned after achieving multiple related competencies
An authrotative statement that the recipient can perform a task
An outline of jobs and their requirements in a career, usually used to outline the expected learning path
An attribute of one service that has distinct competency requirements, levels of mastery, training requirements associated with it
An outline of the duties and requirements to perform these duties for a given position
the instance of the goal that was deselected
The measure of a learner's acquisition of a competency according to the asserting authority
An array of the evidence to support an assertion
The ISO time stamp that an activity is due
A boolean marking if this is a PCS or a different detail event
A unique code for the learner's unit
The physical location of the statement's object
The date the screening or selection expires
The reason the learner has left the learning environment
The reason the learner is restricted
A boolean indicating if the user is performing learning activities while in DEP
The order of recommendations within a curated or projected event
The TLA profile includes Verbs, Activity Types, Extensions, and xAPI document definitions used to represent distributed learning experiences in xAPI.
Restrictions for all tla-defined Statements
Indicates the actor removed specific goal or task
Indicates that the learning activity requirements were met by means other than completing the activity. A waived statement is used to indicate that the activity may be skipped by the actor
Indicates the actor attempted to start up an activity
Indicates the actor finished or concluded the activity normally
Indicates the actor completed an activity to standard
Indicates the actor did not complete an activity to standard
Indicates that the authority or activity provider determined the actor has fulfilled the criteria of the object or activity by means other than completing the activity
Indicates that the AU session was abnormally terminated by a learner's action (or due to a system failure)
Indicates the actor has completed their session normally
Indicates that the activity was started.
Indicates the learner received the recommendation to follow a career path, work towards a learning objective, or perform a learning activity from the actor
Indicates the actor filtered content that aligns to specific goal
Indicates the actor has set a learning goal
Indicates the actor received a list of goal recommendations over time, based on selected goal with recursive depth, what set of content can achieve mastery in the ordered sub-goals
Indicates that the actor assigned themselves a new learning goal, without needing approval
Indicates that the actor has done something to void a previous event

Indicates the actor needed or demanded an object or another actor. Requested indicates a comment that is shared with peers as a group or Coach as a trainer. The request for coaching or help prompts users to respond giving them coaching credit
Indicates an OICS approved a requested activity for the given learner
Indicates the actor searched active learning goals related to specific content, viewing what other content may trigger related goals, based on active goal and recently completed content
Indicates the actor queried what other content may also reinforce the current learning goal, after completing content
Indicates the actor assigned a learning goal to a learner
Indicates the actor scheduled an activity or lesson
Indicates the learner(s) appeared in a Measure of Effectiveness (MOE) search
Indicates the learner(s) appeared in a competency search
Indicates the learner(s) appeared in a Measure of Performance (MOP) search
Indicates the actor completed assessments in a way that will cause a change in their authoritative learner state
Indicates the user performed several connected learning activities that should result in a change in their authoritative learner state
Indicates the actor's competency state needs to be updated based on completed content changes in the Competency Framework
Indicates the learner interacted with "Wild" (unscheduled) content in a social environment
Indicates the learner interacted with "Wild" (out of network) content
Indicates the learner has provided sufficient evidence to update the learner's measure of competence in a given competency
Indicates an OICS approved a change to a competency framework within the TLA that will affect the learners’ states
Indicates an authoritative source changed a learner's competency assertions based on a valid competency framework change
Indicates the learner meets all the requirements for a badge, but hasn't been awarded the badge yet
Indicates the learner was accredited by an authoritative source to perform a given job or task
Indicates the authoritative source verified evidence of learning from a non-authoritative source as reliable data
Indicates the OICS conferred a badge to the learner in the learner context extension
Indicates the actor recruited the learner to join the ecosystem
Indicates the learner met entry criteria for jobs and assigned a career trajectory
OICS detailed the learner to a specific job
OICS mobilized the learner to a state of on duty
Indicates OICS employs the actor such that they started work doing their job
Indicates OICS has enrolled the learner in a schooling system
Indicates OICS has changed a learner’s rank, either up or down
Indicates OICS screened learner for a potentially narrower career trajectory, and passed through a "gate" within their career trajectory
Indicates OICS selected learner based on criteria for a potentially wider career trajectory, opening up new career possibilities
Indicates the actor changed career paths, putting them on a completely different and brand new career trajectory
Indicates the actor has left the learning environment
Indicates OICS temporarily restricted the learner from some (possibly all) participation within the learning environment
This pattern describes the sequence of statements sent over the an entire course registration.

prefLabel.en: A learner socialized content, and an OICS upodated learner state bc of it
A learner interacted with content in the wild, and an OICS upodated learner state bc of it
A learner schedules a learning event based on a reccomendation
A learner has been recruited into the ecosystem. Expected to create a new learner profile.
A learner has been sent to a schoolhose.
A learner has been assigned for a new operational asignment (PCS)
A learner has been chosen for a change of profession
A learner has been released from the learning environment
